column5: Beer               Man sitting at home on the verandah with his wife and he says, "I love you."    She asks, "Is that you or the beer talking?"    He replies, "It's me............. talking to the beer."
Thanks, I needed that My first chuckle today
Finally a post we can all relate to.  No chance for a different point of view or any ranting about this one!
thats funny...and i dont even drink!
